  • Constructor Details

    • RegressionAnalysis

      public RegressionAnalysis(org.apache.commons.math.stat.regression.SimpleRegression s)
      Initializes a RegressionAnalysis object with the provided SimpleRegression instance. The degrees of freedom (n) for the t-distribution are set based on the number of data points in the SimpleRegression.
      Parameters:
      s - The SimpleRegression instance containing the regression analysis results.

  • Method Details

    • getTc

      public double getTc(double alfa)
      Calculates the critical value (tc) for the t-distribution with the given significance level (alfa).
      Parameters:
      alfa - The significance level.
      Returns:
      The critical value for the t-distribution.

    • calcularIC

      public String calcularIC(double IC)
      Calculates the confidence intervals for the regression parameters (a and b) based on the given confidence level (IC).
      Parameters:
      IC - The confidence level.
      Returns:
      The confidence intervals for the regression parameters (a and b).

    • getB

      public double getB()
      Retrieves the slope (b) of the regression line.
      Returns:
      The slope of the regression line.

    • getA

      public double getA()
      Retrieves the intercept (a) of the regression line.
      Returns:
      The intercept of the regression line.

    • getAString

      public String getAString()
      Retrieves the intercept (a) of the regression line as a string formatted with four decimal places.
      Returns:
      The intercept of the regression line as a formatted string.

    • getBString

      public String getBString()
      Retrieves the slope (b) of the regression line as a string formatted with four decimal places.
      Returns:
      The slope of the regression line as a formatted string.

    • getPricePrediceted

      public String getPricePrediceted(double value)
      Predicts the price based on the regression line for the given value.
      Parameters:
      value - The value for which the price prediction is calculated.
      Returns:
      The predicted price.

    • fourDecimalCase

      public String fourDecimalCase(Double flota)
      Formats a Double value to a string representation with four decimal places.
      Parameters:
      flota - The Double value to be formatted.
      Returns:
      The formatted string representation of the value.

    • getEquation

      public String getEquation()
      Retrieves the equation of the regression line in the form "y = a + bx".
      Returns:
      The equation of the regression line.

    • getR

      public String getR()
      Retrieves the correlation coefficient (R) of the regression analysis.
      Returns:
      The correlation coefficient.

    • getR2

      public String getR2()
      Retrieves the determination coefficient (R^2) of the regression analysis.
      Returns:
      The determination coefficient.

    • testeHipotese

      public String testeHipotese(double a0, double b0)
      Performs a hypothesis test for the regression parameters (a and b) with the given null hypotheses (a0 and b0). Calculates the t-values for the null hypotheses and determines whether to reject or accept them.
      Parameters:
      a0 - The null hypothesis for the intercept (a).
      b0 - The null hypothesis for the slope (b).
      Returns:
      The results of the hypothesis test.

    • getTableAnova

      public List<String> getTableAnova()
      Retrieves the ANOVA table for the regression analysis.
      Returns:
      The ANOVA table as a list of strings.

    • tableAnovaSignificancia

      public String tableAnovaSignificancia()
      Determines the significance of the regression based on the F-test from the ANOVA table.
      Returns:
      A message indicating whether the regression is significant or not.

    • FSignificancia

      public String FSignificancia()
      Retrieves the significance level (p-value) from the F-test in the ANOVA table.
      Returns:
      The significance level as a formatted string.
